summary: Completed all 4 phases: Phase 1 - Footer navigation dynamic. Phase 2 - CommentSection and ReviewForm Livewire components created with full functionality. Phase 3 - ClickController finalized with redirect()->away(). Phase 4 - Student Dashboard pages updated: MyCourses (thumbnail accessor), OrderHistory (invoice download with controller), Bookmarks (logo accessor). Created InvoiceController and invoice view. Created FRONTEND_INTEGRATION_GUIDE.md with usage examples.
current_status: All frontend integrations complete. Livewire components ready. Relationships need to be added to Post/Course/AiTool/Lesson models for full functionality. Next: Add relationships to models and integrate components into show pages.
